```py
> aggregate(data = teens, age ~ gradyear, mean, na.rm = TRUE)
 gradyear      age
1     2006 18.65586
2     2007 17.70617
3     2008 16.76770
4     2009 15.81957

```

```py
> ave_age <- ave(teens$age, teens$gradyear, FUN =
 function(x) mean(x, na.rm = TRUE))

```
